revised_title: On the Action of Hydrobromic Acid on Codeia and the Formation of Bromocodide
tldr: The author investigates the reaction between codeia and hydrobromic acid, leading to the formation of bromocodide. They also study the properties and analysis of the resulting compounds, including deoxycodeia, bromocodide hydrobromate, and bromotetracodeia. The author's findings contribute to the understanding of the chemistry of opium alkaloids.
